Text.Name: Weather_Sunny
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such nice weather really puts a smile on one's face!

Text.Name: Weather_Overcast
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such a bleak day is rather dreary

Text.Name: Weather_LightRain
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Light rain really imbues one with a sense of serenity

Text.Name: Weather_HeavyRain
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such a downpour can get on one's nerves

Text.Name: Weather_LightSnow
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The flurries flying all about brightens one's spirits

Text.Name: Weather_HeavySnow
Text.Desc: It's looks like a blizzard outside!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such a heavy snowfall really is a delight

Text.Name: Weather_DenseFog
Text.Desc: The fog is so thick out, it's like pea soup!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The fog is so thick that it's rather annoying

Text.Name: Weather_SpringAir
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The arrival of spring really invigorates the spirit

Text.Name: Weather_Melancholy
Text.Desc: I don't know why but everyone has been down in the dumps lately...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The gloomy mood has left a palpable sense of melancholy in the air

Text.Name: Weather_HarvestAir
Text.Desc: What an abundant harvest, I'm so happy!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such an abundant harvest leaves everyone content

Text.Name: Weather_Impetuous
Text.Desc: It's difficult to stay calm recently.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that There's a palpable sense of irritability in the air, everyone seems testy

Text.Name: Weather_Hail
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Hail tends to make one a bit worrisome

Text.Name: Weather_MouldRains
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that All this rain really makes one agitated

Text.Name: Weather_Drought
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Droughts always make one worry

Text.Name: Weather_Rainstorm
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Rainstorms like this always make one anxious

Text.Name: Weather_Fohn
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Foehn Winds always make one feel like one's whole body needs moisturizing

Text.Name: Weather_DustStorm
Text.Desc: A Dust Storm has sprung up.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Dust Storm spread dirt everywhere. EVERYWHERE

Text.Name: Weather_LingRarefiedWave
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A Qi drought really leaves one feeling ill at ease

Text.Name: Weather_LingUpWave
Text.Desc: There's been a burst of Qi.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A Burst of Qi really leaves one feeling pleased

Text.Name: Weather_HeatWave
Text.Desc: This sudden onset of heat is unbearable...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The sudden onset of heat leaves one feeling anxious

Text.Name: Weather_ColdWave
Text.Desc: A cold winter has set in.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Cold winters leave one ill at ease

Text.Name: Weather_HeatWaveInWinter
Text.Desc: A warm wind in the depths of winter is a welcome reprieve.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A warm wind in winter makes one want to stretch

Text.Name: Weather_ColdWaveInSummer
Text.Desc: A cool breeze in midsummer is a welcome reprieve.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A cool breeze in summer is always comforting

Text.Name: Weather_PermanentNight
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A polar night can be scary

Text.Name: Weather_Miasma
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that feeling better to cover one's nose and mouth when a miasma is about

Text.Name: Weather_LightningStorm
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Thunderstorms like this wreak havoc on one's nerves

Text.Name: Weather_LuShu_SunnyDay
Text.Desc: The sound of beasts sounds like beautiful singing.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The calls of the wild can really imbue one with a sense of satisfaction

Text.Name: Weather_SpringFestival
Text.Desc: The holiday atmosphere can prove truly intoxicating.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that feeling easy to be immersed in the joy of a festival

Text.Name: Weather_ZuShiBiHu
Text.Desc: The founding father's protection suffuses the Sect with an air of Immortality.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The world of the Immortal seems to abound all around
